name: Brambles
headAddress: Level 10, Angel Place 123 Pitt Street Sydney, NSW 2000
goal:
- Promote visibility of the Brambles pooling business of pallets, reusable plastic crates and containers as well as its subsidiaries CHEP, IFCO and CCC
- Increase EU decision makers understanding of issues of Brambles relevance.
- Advocate in favour of our core business principles: sustainability, environment, reducing food waste
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Internal Market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Sustainability goals including on reducing food waste
- Circular Economy
- Packaging Waste and tax on waste
- Pest measures in plants
- Trade issues: T-TIP, EU-Australia/New Zealand FTA, India FTA
- Turkey customs code
- Harmonisation of standards
- Research projects including REPHRAME
